::: {#hero-heading}
Wu Keping, male, professor, master's supervisor, doctor of management (accounting) of Renmin University of China, and visiting scholar of Macy University in New Zealand. He is the first young and middle-aged academic backbone of Chaohu University, a member of the second and third grassroots academic committees of Chaohu University, and an outstanding Communist Party member of Chaohu University. 
He serves as an anonymous reviewer for the top domestic accounting journal "Accounting Research" and many foreign SSCI journals, a special researcher at the Chinese Government Audit Research Center, a director of the Intelligent Accounting Branch of the Chinese Society of Business Accountants, and a member of the Chinese Accounting Society. He is expert in the evaluation of senior accounting titles in Anhui Province. He is selected for the cultivation project of discipline (major) leaders in higher education institutions in Anhui Province. More than 30 journal papers have been published, including CSSCI, SSCI, and EI searches. The papers have been cited over 800 times and downloaded over 30000 times. The SSRN papers are ranked in the top 10 globally in terms of download volume, and have been successfully selected as one of the top 1% ESI Highly Cited Papers in the academic field and the top 0.1% ESI Hot Cited Papers in the Economics academic field. The paper is selected as high cited papers, high download papers, and high-quality papers in the academic essence of China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI). 
He has won one first prize of excellent thesis of Chaohu University Social Science Federation, one excellent thesis of Anhui Provincial Social Science Federation, and one first prize of scientific research innovation of Renmin University of China. He has  won second prize for teaching achievements in Anhui Province. He has presided over and participated in more than 20 educational and research projects, including the Anhui Provincial Philosophy and Social Science Planning Project, the Anhui Provincial Social Science Federation Innovation and Development Research Project, the Anhui Provincial Key Humanities and Social Sciences Project, the Anhui Provincial Top notch Talents Project, the Anhui Provincial Department of Education Quality Engineering Key Project, the National Natural Science Foundation Project, and the Ministry of Education Humanities and Social Sciences Project, as well as horizontal projects. The accumulated educational and research funds amounted to over 800000 yuan.


## Background

- 2011-2014: Ph.D. in Accounting, Renmin University of China, specializing in Accounting and Finance


:::
